Generic pandapower NetworksÂ¶

Besides creating your own grids in pandapower you can use the networks modul as well. The pandapower networks modul contains the (in)famous Kerber networks, CIGRE networks and randomly generated pandapower networks which can be used for testing. Additionally you can use IEEE case networks.

You can find documentation for the individual modules here:

  • Simple pandapower test networks
    • Four load branch
    • Four loads with branches out
    • Four bus system
    • Medium voltage open ring
  • Random pandapower networks
    • Random line network
    • Random empty grid
    • Set up random empty grid with loads
  • CIGRE Networks
    • High voltage transmission network
    • Medium voltage distribution network
    • Medium voltage distribution network with DER
    • Low voltage distribution network
  • IEEE cases
    • Case 4gs
    • Case 6ww
    • Case 9
    • Case 9Q
    • Case 30
    • Case 30pwl
    • Case 30Q
